title: Yevgeni Safonov (Uzbekistani footballer)
text:
Yevgeni Safonov (born 6 July 1977 in <a href="Toshkent">Toshkent</a>) is a former <a href="Uzbekistan">Uzbekistan</a>i professional <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> goalkeeper.
He is a member of the <a href="Uzbekistan%20national%20football%20team">national team</a>, and has played 26 matches since his debut in 1999.
Safonov is 1.99 m (6 ft 6 in) tall and weighs 96 kg (15 st 1 lb).
